name: Skeleton Man in the Quest for Skin
name_original: Skeleton Man in the Quest for Skin
description:
CONTROLS: Arrow keys to move; (A) is X key; (B) is C key.

Skeleton Man has many things, but they do not have any skin.

Find Skin Man and remove their skin to win! In the way, find other random Men and acquire their powers.

DISCLAIMER: The HTML version's framerate is bad.

Made by dozabie and jazzyAxolotl with GameMaker 1.4 for GBJAM8.
